FUND_YOUR_ACCOUNT.TITLE: Fund Your Account
FUND_YOUR_ACCOUNT.LOGIN_TO_NETBANKING_PAYNOW: Please note that your investment funds must originate from an account in your legal name and a Singapore registered bank. Accounts may be suspended if any suspicious activity is detected.
FUND_YOUR_ACCOUNT.LOGIN_TO_NETBANKING_BANK: Please note that your investment funds must originate from an account in your legal name and a Singapore registered bank. Accounts may be suspended if any suspicious activity is detected.
FUND_YOUR_ACCOUNT.TAKE_SCREENSHOT: Take a Screenshot to do it later
FUND_YOUR_ACCOUNT.ADD_REFERENCE_CODE_INFO: To credit the funds to your account, please indicate this reference code in your fund transfer.
FUND_YOUR_ACCOUNT.SETUP_AUTO_DEPOSIT_DESC: Hey, you can save time when you set up auto-deposits through your bank! Find out how in the bank transfer details below.
FUND_YOUR_ACCOUNT.PROCESS_TIME_INFO: Fund your account within 21 days to kickstart your investment!

SHOW_BANK_TRANSCTIONS.LBL_STEP_1: Log in to your internet banking or mobile banking app of a Singapore registered bank.
SHOW_BANK_TRANSCTIONS.LBL_STEP_2: Select an account of your own (registered under your name) to transfer from and enter the amount to transfer.
SHOW_BANK_TRANSCTIONS.LBL_STEP_4: Verify and confirm the transaction details.
SHOW_BANK_TRANSCTIONS.LBL_STEP_5: Your request will be processed within 1 - 2 business days. We will notify you once your portfolio top up has been successful.
SHOW_BANK_TRANSCTIONS.DESC_SETUP_AUTO_DEPOSIT: Hey, you can save time when you set up auto-deposits through your bank! Find out how with your bank now!

SHOW_PAYNOW.LBL_STEP_1: Log in to your internet banking or mobile banking app of a Singapore registered bank.
SHOW_PAYNOW.LBL_STEP_2: Select an account of your own (registered under your name) to transfer from and enter the amount to transfer.
SHOW_PAYNOW.LBL_STEP_4: Verify and confirm the transaction details.
SHOW_PAYNOW.LBL_STEP_5: Your request will be processed within 1 - 2 business days. We will notify you once your portfolio top up has been successful.
SHOW_PAYNOW.DESC_SETUP_AUTO_DEPOSIT: Hey, you can save time when you set up auto-deposits through your bank! Find out how with your bank now!

TOPUP.TITLE: TOP UP

YOUR_INVESTMENT.REMEMBER: Remember to top up your portfolio by

YOUR_PORTFOLIO.TITLE: Your Portfolio
YOUR_PORTFOLIO.fUND_YOUR_ACCOUNT_MESSAGE: Please complete fund transfer within xx days to start investing. If you have completed the fund transfer, it will be processed in 2 - 3 business days.

TOTAL_RETURNS.TITLE: Total Returns
TOTAL_RETURNS.MESSAGE: The total returns are calculated by geometrically linking the periodic returns between all your transactions. This return is also known as the time-weighted return.

CONFIRM_WITHDRAWAL.TITLE: Confirm Withdrawal
CONFIRM_WITHDRAWAL.DESC_PORTFOLIO_TO_CASH: You are withdrawing the following amount from your portfolio to your cash account.
CONFIRM_WITHDRAWAL.DESC_PORTFOLIO_TO_BANK: You are withdrawing the following amount from your portfolio to your bank account.
CONFIRM_WITHDRAWAL.DESC_CASH_TO_BANK: You are withdrawing the following amount from your cash account to your bank account.

WITHDRAW_SUCCESS.TITLE: Withdrawal Request Submitted
WITHDRAW_SUCCESS.DESC: We will update you on the status of your request within 2 working days.

WITHDRAW_PAYMENT_METHOD.TITLE: Choose Payment Method
WITHDRAW_PAYMENT_METHOD.CHEQUES_WILL_BE_POSTED_ADDRESS: Cheque will be posted to this address
WITHDRAW_PAYMENT_METHOD.IF_WISH_TO_CHANGE_WRITE: If you wish to change your mailing address, please write to us

ADD_BANK_MODAL.TITLE: Add Bank Account
ADD_BANK_MODAL.ACCOUNT_HOLDER_DESC: Due to regulations, you can only withdraw funds to an account under your legal name.
